description: New Light is a magic organization based in the United Kingdom, which specializes in Norse-based magic.They were hired to work as couriers by the second princess of England, http://anidb.net/ch98252 [Carissa], they later change sides at the climax of the British Halloween and are apparently still free to operate as an organization.Source: Toaru Wiki
name: Majutsu Kessha Aratanaru Hikari
